actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

official_title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to limit expenditures in House of Representatives elections.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit a candidate for the office of Representative in, or Delegate or Resident Commissioner to, the Congress from making aggregate expenditures, with respect to an election for such office, which exceed $300,000.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to limit expenditures in House of Representatives elections.
